    Your help will affect its evolution

    ar.net

    Net singleton to manage the network methods.

    Methods

    static html(url, cb(html))

    Loads raw html string of specified url.

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    url string

    Relative url of the default domain. Set the default domain first with ar.setDomain(url);.
    cb(html) func

    Callback. html will be the string when it's sucessful, otherwise it's null.

    static get(url, params, cb(isSucc,)

    Gets json data from the url by GET method.

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    url string

    Relative url of the default domain. Set the default domain first with ar.setDomain(url);.
    params object

    Json object of parameters.
    cb(isSucc, func

    data) - Callback. isSucc will be true when it's successful. data is json object of the result.

    static get(url, params, cb(isSucc,)

    Gets json data from the url by POST method.

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    url string

    Relative url of the default domain. Set the default domain first with ar.setDomain(url);.
    params object

    Json object of parameters.
    cb(isSucc, func

    data) - Callback. isSucc will be true when it's successful. data is json object of the result.

    static upload(opt)

    Uploads files to the server.

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    opt object

    Options as below:
    {
    url: '/customer.picture', // Relative url of the default domain.
    params: [{ key1: val1 }, { key2: val2 }, ... ], // Query parameters array.
    files: [ path1, path2, ... ], // Local file path string array specified by 'input' tag.
    onProgress: function(oEvent) { ... }, // <Optional>. Please refer to https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/XMLHttpRequest/Using_XMLHttpRequest.
    onError: function(evt) { ... }, // <Optional>
    onCancel: function(evt) { ... }, // <Optional>
    onDone: function(isSucc, json) { ... }, // <Optional>. isSucc is true when the query is successful. json is the json structure of the result
    }
    NHN Entertainment. Frontend Development Lab
